name: etude

scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:run && npm run build:package
scripts.build:package: echo window.etude = require('./etude.js'); > js/package.js && browserify js/package.js -s window -o js/etude-browser.js && rm js/package.js

author: Andrew Han
tonicExample: const {Accidental, Chord, Degree, Dynamic, Interval, Inversion, Key, KeySignature, Letter, Mode, MusicConstants, Note, Pitch, Scale, Value} = require("etude");
